programme.title: A Bronx Tale
programme.desc: Robert De Niro makes his directorial debut with this expanded adaptation of Chazz Palminteri's one-character play. De Niro's role of Lorenzo Anello, an Italian-America bus driver, is secondary to the part of his son Calogero. The top dog in Calogero's Bronx neighborhood is flashy "wiseguy" Sonny. When the boy witnesses Sonny commit a murder, he honors the code of the streets and refuses to tell the cops. Sonny befriends him and introduces the impressionable youngster to the creature comforts that mob connections can bring. But though he idolizes Sonny, the boy loves and respects his decent, honest father. It takes a major tragedy for the 17-year-old boy (now played by Lillo Brancato) to decide his true course in life(n)

programme.title: I'm Dying Up Here
programme.desc: Pilot. Comedians struggle to make it big in the Los Angeles comedy scene of the 1970s. In the opener, stand-ups at L.A.'s primo comedy club react to a rising star's appearance on "The Tonight Show." Meanwhile, Boston transplants Eddie and Ron are surprised by their unorthodox accommodations; and young up-and-comer Adam is forced into a compromising situation by his manager(n)

But Jigsaw is dying and his apprentice Amanda kidnaps a doctor to keep him alive. Meanwhile, Amanda is playing Jigsaw's deadly game with a new chosen person(n)

programme.desc: A demoted time-traveling troubleshooter on a mission that could hold terrifying circumstances for Earth must also ward off a team of assassins bent on stopping him(n)

programme.title: Bang Bang Baby
programme.desc: A teenager living in a 1960's small town believes her hopes of becoming a famous singer will come true when her rock star idol gets stranded in town and romance blooms between them. But a leak in a nearby chemical plant threatens to turn her dream into a nightmare(n)

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: The story of a police robot named Chappie, who develops the ability to think and feel for himself. As people fight back against the mechanised police force, sinister forces seek to capture Chappie for their nefarious purposes(n)

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: A banished warrior and a reclusive wizard team up to defend the Celtic people from an invasion by the Saxons in this epic adventure(n)

programme.title: The Roost
programme.desc: Creatures of the night find new prey on the scariest night of the year in this horror story. It's Halloween night, and four friends -- Allison (Vanessa Horneff), Elliott (Wil Horneff), Trevor (Karl Jacob), and Brian (Sean Reid) -- are on a road trip en route to a friend's wedding when their car breaks down after running into something. Looking for help, the four happen upon the farmhouse of an elderly couple, Elvin (Richard Little) and May (Barbara Wilhide), which is located next to a huge barn. Elvin and May have already become lost in the darkness of the barn, and soon two of the lost travelers are suffering the same fate as they search for friendly strangers. However, while they can barely see a hand in front of their face, they discover they're not alone in the barn, which has become home to a huge swarm of bloodthirsty bats. The Roost is framed by an introduction and postscript from a television horror show host, played by Tom Noonan(n)

programme.title: Reeker
programme.desc: Five teens on their way to a rave find the highway inexplicably closed. Making the fatal mistake of staying at a deserted motel, they find themselves in a terrifying life and death limbo with a violent and decaying killer preying on their lives and their noses(n)

programme.title: Doom
programme.desc: Scientists on Mars accidentally create necromutants with a taste for blood. When the mutants run amok on a space station, the authorities send in the marines with orders to destroy all monsters(n)

programme.title: Shaun of the Dead
programme.desc: Shaun's humdrum existence takes a turn for the interesting when the undead take over London. He gathers his loved ones in the safest place he knows - the pub. Comedy(n)

programme.desc: A teenager living in a 1960's small town believes her hopes of becoming a famous singer will come true when her rock star idol gets stranded in town and romance blooms between them. But a leak in a nearby chemical plant threatens to turn her dream into a nightmare(n)

programme.title: Rosemary's Baby
programme.desc: Roman Polanski's mould-breaking horror story stars Mia Farrow and John Cassavetes as Rosemary and Guy Woodhouse, a young couple who move into an apartment block where they are befriended by Minnie and Roman Castevet. When Rosemary becomes pregnant, even though the circumstances of the conception are hazy, she is pleased by the concern of her husband, her neighbours and their friends, who are prepared to go to any lengths to ensure she has a healthy baby..(n)

programme.title: Walter
programme.desc: A movie-theater cashier believes he's the son of God, and is accosted by a ghost who claims to dwell in limbo. This forces him to rethink his place in the universe, and soon he believes the ghost can help him understand his fate(n)

programme.title: Bloodworx
programme.desc: Two college roommates enroll in a clinical drug trial in order to make some quick cash, but get more than they bargained for after agreeing to spend 14 days in a secluded medical facility(n)

programme.title: Willow Creek

programme.title: The Howling Reborn
programme.desc: A high school senior learns he descends from a long line of werewolves, and attempts to choose between embracing his inner-beast and holding on to his humanity as the long-running horror franchise returns. Will Kidman (Landon Liboiron) is your typical teenager; he's got an eye for girls, and lately his gaze has been lingering on a gorgeous classmate (Lindsey Shaw). Meanwhile, an enigmatic woman (Ivana Milicevic) from Will's distant past resurfaces with a shocking revelation: Will's ancestors were lycanthropes, and now he will inherit the secrets of their incredible power. But when Will realizes that embracing his destiny will spell certain death for the girl he loves, he prepares to make a choice that could spell the end of his monstrous bloodline, and incur the wrath of the very creatures that have claimed him as one of their own(n)

But when Will realizes that embracing his destiny will spell certain death for the girl he loves, he prepares to make a choice that could spell the end of his monstrous bloodline, and incur the wrath of the very creatures that have claimed him as one of their own(n)

programme.title: The Roost
programme.desc: Creatures of the night find new prey on the scariest night of the year in this horror story. It's Halloween night, and four friends -- Allison (Vanessa Horneff), Elliott (Wil Horneff), Trevor (Karl Jacob), and Brian (Sean Reid) -- are on a road trip en route to a friend's wedding when their car breaks down after running into something. Looking for help, the four happen upon the farmhouse of an elderly couple, Elvin (Richard Little) and May (Barbara Wilhide), which is located next to a huge barn. Elvin and May have already become lost in the darkness of the barn, and soon two of the lost travelers are suffering the same fate as they search for friendly strangers. However, while they can barely see a hand in front of their face, they discover they're not alone in the barn, which has become home to a huge swarm of bloodthirsty bats. The Roost is framed by an introduction and postscript from a television horror show host, played by Tom Noonan(n)

programme.title: America's Sweethearts
programme.desc: Studio publicist Billy Crystal has a problem or two. The latest film he's promoting stars Catherine Zeta-Jones and John Cusack, happily together and loved by America until they split due to her adultery. Meanwhile, director Christopher Walken has spent the $86m budget but won't let anyone see the finished product and the press screening is imminent... Complicating matters is Julia Roberts, Zeta-Jones sister and Pa, who pines after Cusack... Joe Roth's romantic comedy, set in the wild world of Hollywood, also stars Alan Arkin, Seth Green and Stanley Tucci(n)

programme.title: Disgraced
programme.desc: An examination of the 2003 murder of Baylor University basketball player Patrick Dennehy by his friend Carlton Dotson, and the ensuing accusations aimed at the university and coach Dave Bliss(n)

programme.title: A Bronx Tale
programme.desc: Robert De Niro makes his directorial debut with this expanded adaptation of Chazz Palminteri's one-character play. De Niro's role of Lorenzo Anello, an Italian-America bus driver, is secondary to the part of his son Calogero. The top dog in Calogero's Bronx neighborhood is flashy "wiseguy" Sonny. When the boy witnesses Sonny commit a murder, he honors the code of the streets and refuses to tell the cops. Sonny befriends him and introduces the impressionable youngster to the creature comforts that mob connections can bring. But though he idolizes Sonny, the boy loves and respects his decent, honest father. It takes a major tragedy for the 17-year-old boy (now played by Lillo Brancato) to decide his true course in life(n)

programme.title: House of D

programme.title: Sebastian Maniscalco: Why Would You Do That?

programme.title: Al Madrigal: Shrimpin' Ain't Easy
programme.desc: Former "Daily Show With Jon Stewart" correspondent Al Madrigal applies his comedic insight to relatable topics, such as cilantro politics, anger management and an unbelievable tale of seafood revenge(n)

programme.title: Brokeback Mountain
programme.desc: (2005) Showing for the first time on More4, Heath Ledger and Jake Gyllenhaal play Ennis Del Mar and Jack Twist, two young cowboys paired up for a job tending sheep on a Wyoming mountain. As the days go by, their relationship develops until, after a heavy night drinking whisky, they make passionate love. Initially denying the attraction each feels for the other, they go their separate ways at the end of the job. Both marry and have children but meet regularly to ignite their undying passion for each other, living desperate, unfulfilled lives between each meeting until the untimely death of one leaves the other broken and devastated. Ang Lee's Oscar-winning drama is a bold, emotional story of a passion that cannot be denied but must be hidden from a world that can only condemn it. Premiere(n)

programme.title: Bride of the Wind
programme.desc: Bruce Beresford (Driving Miss Daisy) delivers this fact-based drama about one of the most fascinating private lives of the 20th century. Alma Schindler (Sarah Wynter) was one of the most renowned young beauties in turn-of-the-century Vienna, sought after as a romantic conquest by some of the most famous men in the city, including the artist Gustav Klimt (August Schmolzer). She is won, however, by the most challenging and enigmatic artistic figure of them all, composer/conductor Gustav Mahler (Jonathan Pryce). His one demand is that she give up her own aspirations as a composer, which she has nursed for years. She agrees, and their marriage proves to be a devoted yet loveless union, producing two children but leaving Alma bereft of affection. She suppresses her frustrations as her husband's star rises, sublimating her ambitions completely. His career advances yield extraordinary music but equally notable controversies, and the marriage is riven by stress. When their oldest daughter dies, Alma's health is broken. While convalescing at a sanitarium, she meets another patient, Walter Gropius (Simon Verhoeven). He is gentle and attentive, and they begin an affair, which her husband accidentally learns of later. Their marriage survives, but Mahler also knows that he is a doomed man because of a damaged heart. After his death, Alma Mahler marries Gropius, an ambitious young architect with revolutionary ideas. Their marriage lasts but a few years, for Alma is drawn to another man, the artist Oskar Kokoschka (Vincent Perez). Kokoschka is young, iconoclastic, and daring -- all of the things that the career- and status-oriented Gropius isn't. Their affair yields a renowned painting of Alma that Kokoschka calls Bride of the Wind, a depiction of their passion amid a storm-swept background. They also conceive a child that Alma decides not to carry to term. She returns to Gropius for a time, while Kokoschka sells the painting for enough money to buy a commission in the army, and he is reported killed in action during World War I. Finally, after leaving Gropius, Alma meets a gifted author, Franz Werfel (Gregor Seberg), whom she marries. Her past catches up with her in an odd way, however, when Kokoschka returns, having survived the war and captivity -- he is still obsessed with Alma, to the point that he walks around Vienna in the company of a life-size doll of her, which he destroys in a fit of anger one night at a party. Meanwhile, in Alma's life with Franz Werfel, she finally finds peace and fulfillment, even as a composer -- the movie ends with a 1925 recital at which soprano Frances Alda (Renee Fleming) performed Alma Mahler Werfel's songs(n)

programme.title: Cabin Fever

Carles Torrens directed this horror thriller(n)

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: Frank Marshall's all-out-action film stars Laura Linney, Dylan Walsh, Tim Curry and Ernie Hudson as a disparate group who embark on an expedition into the heart of the Congo. Each has different reasons for setting out into the unknown. But having survived volcanoes and hungry hippo attacks, nothing could have prepared them for the greatest danger: a troop of intelligent killer apes who, as one critic wrote, "..make King Kong look like the Jolly Green Giant". Based on Michael Crichton's bestseller, Marshall's film is great fun, with wonderful cliff-hanging moments and, in Dr Karen Ross (Linney), a character who can out-tough Indiana Jones any day(n)

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: A paroled thief (John Travolta) gets sucked into an audacious heist scheme to steal a Monet painting by replacing it with a perfect duplicate(n)

programme.title: A Civil Action
programme.desc: A true story, based on Jonathan Harr's gripping book, is written and directed by Steven Zaillian whose writing credits include Clear and Present Danger and Schindler's List. John Travolta plays hot shot lawyer Schlictmann, who helps a group of families sue two manufacturing companies for dumping poisonous chemicals in the community's water supply. Believing the chemicals are causing cancer-related deaths and health problems, they fight for compensation and environmental safety(n)

programme.title: The Alamo
programme.desc: Re-teaming Dennis Quaid with John Lee Hancock, the director of 2002's The Rookie, The Alamo retells the story of the historic 1836 battle in the Texan War of Independence. Facing 4,000 Mexican troops, 186 Texan soldiers and volunteers -- including William Travis (Patrick Wilson), Davy Crockett (Billy Bob Thornton), and Jim Bowie (Jason Patric) -- retreat within the walls of the Alamo, a Franciscan mission that was converted into a military fort. Once inside, the men prepare themselves for what will be a bloody battle to the death, as General Sam Houston (Quaid) leads the charge from the outside. Emilio Echevarria and Jordi Molla co-star(n)

programme.title: The Count of Monte Cristo
programme.desc: Low-born Edmond Dantes is betrayed by his arrogant, aristocratic friend Fernand, who steals his bride and condemns him to the hellish Château d'If prison. After 13 years of suffering, Dantes escapes, gathers a hidden fortune and begins an intricate and fiendish revenge(n)

programme.title: The Ghost Writer
programme.desc: Ewan McGregor and Pierce Brosnan star in Roman Polanski's much lauded adaptation of author Robert Harris's political conspiracy thriller. When the corpse of the man ghost-writing the memoirs of former British Prime Minister Adam Lang is found, apparently having accidentally fallen from a ferry, another writer is quickly hired to finish the job. The new man (McGregor, in an un-named role) is dispatched to the ex-PM's swish home in the States, where he now resides. As the writer begins his task, he thinks it odd that he's not allowed access to his predecessor's draft but gets on with the work, under pressure from all sides to finish the job quickly. But, later, he uncovers documents, seemingly left by the dead man, which throw a new light on everything: they suggest Lang and his wealthy friends have very dark secrets, ones they'd possibly even kill for in order to keep them hidden. Will the new ghost-writer now suffer the same fate as the previous one?(n)

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: Mark Wahlberg stars in Antoine Fuqua's thriller as Bob Swagger, an ex-Special Ops sharpshooter. He's called out of retirement by Col Isaac Johnson to help foil an assassination attempt on the President, but ends up framed as the assassin. Injured and on the run, he can only rely on Sara Fenn, the girlfriend of his ex-partner, and FBI agent Nick Memphis, who's come across evidence of the conspiracy. The three have to evade Johnson and his cohorts in a race to prove their innocence in this intelligent action movie(n)

programme.title: Unknown
programme.desc: Liam Neeson, January Jones and Diane Kruger star in the Irish TV Premiere of Unknown. Dr. Martin Harris awakens after a car accident in Berlin to discover that his wife suddenly doesn't recognize him and another man has assumed his identity. Ignored by disbelieving authorities and hunted by mysterious assassins, he finds himself alone, tired and on the run. Aided by an unlikely ally, Martin plunges headlong into a deadly mystery that will force him to question his sanity, his identity, and just how far he's willing to go to uncover the truth. Starring Liam Neeson, January Jones and Diane Kruger(n)

programme.title: Forrest Gump
programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars in Robert Zemeckis's multi-Oscar winning film as the eponymous Gump, an idiot-savant present at the memorable events of recent history, from the Vietnam War to the Watergate break-in, from ping-pong diplomacy with the Chinese to investing in Apple computers at the beginning. With Robin Wright as the girl he can't forget (but can't have) and Sally Field as his mom, Forrest Gump is a panoramic look at slices of American culture but, like a box of chocolates, some segments are more tasteful than others(n)

programme.desc: Git Gone. Jumping between the past and present, Laura's life is explored, revealing how she met Shadow, how she died and how she came to be sitting on the edge of his motel-room bed(n)

programme.title: American Gods
programme.desc: Lemon Scented You. Trying to work things out with his dead and unfaithful wife, Shadow's reunion is interrupted when he and Mr. Wednesday are kidnapped by the New Gods(n)

programme.title: American Gods
programme.desc: A Murder of Gods. The New Gods' show of force sends Shadow and Mr. Wednesday on the run and in search of a safe haven in the company of one of Mr. Wednesday's oldest friends, Vulcan, God of the Fire and the Forge(n)

programme.title: American Gods
programme.desc: A Prayer for Mad Sweeney. After an over-too-quickly reunion with Shadow, Laura joins an unlikely travel companion on the road back to life and back to Shadow. Mad Sweeney's long, often tragic past is explored(n)

programme.desc: Keanu Reeves and James Spader star in this haunting thriller about a serial killer. Troubled FBI agent Joel Campbell (Spader) goes up against a sadistic murderer (Reeves) who sends him photos of his next victims, giving him 24 hours to save them. Marisa Tomei, Ernie Hudson, Chris Ellis, Robert Cicchini, Yvonne Niami(n)

programme.title: The Meddler
programme.desc: After the death of her husband, a woman named Marnie relocates to L.A. to be closer to her daughter Lori, a Hollywood screenwriter. While Lori frets about her mom's smothering ways, Marnie keeps getting involved in the lives of others: She dates an ex-cop, helps an Apple Store employee study for school and pays for a lesbian wedding(n)

programme.title: Deliver Us From Eva
programme.desc: Fearsome Eva bosses her three sisters around, driving their three boyfriends to distraction. So they call in Ray, who says he's a specialist with the ladies. Ray's got it all, but even he struggles with the fire-breathing health inspector. Romantic comedy(n)

programme.title: P2
programme.desc: A corporate workaholic finds that her decision to work late on Christmas Eve has potentially deadly consequences in this thriller starring Wes Bentley and Rachel Nichols. It's that time of the year, and as the snow falls outside and families gather around the dinner table, Angela vows to close one last deal before the holiday. Now late for her family gathering, Angela rushes down to the garage in hopes of racing home and catching dinner before it gets cold. When her car refuses to start, her phone fails to get a signal, and everyone else has already left, it begins to appear as if Angela's luck may have finally run out. Thankfully, a friendly security guard appears and offers to lend a helping hand. During the course of discussion, the security guard flirtatiously invites Angela to share the Christmas dinner he has prepared in the parking office -- an offer that the high-powered corporate climber laughingly dismisses. The next thing Angela knows, she wakes up tied to a chair in the cold security office located on level P2. It appears as if the security guard's invitation wasn't optional, and that Christmas dinner was the last thing on his mind. Upon realizing just how serious her situation truly is, Angela struggles to escape her subterranean prison and make it out so that she might live to see another Christmas morning(n)

programme.title: Walk the Line
programme.desc: A chronicle of country music legend Johnny Cash's life, from his early days on an Arkansas cotton farm to his rise to fame with Sun Records in Memphis, where he recorded alongside Elvis Presley, Jerry Lee Lewis and Carl Perkins(n)

programme.title: Superstar
programme.desc: Molly Shannon recreates her Saturday Night Live persona as a coltish Catholic schoolgirl who dreams of becoming a Hollywood star and marrying the best-looking boy in school. Look out for Tom Green, better known as the star of Road Trip and husband of Drew Barrymore(n)

programme.title: Blood Father
programme.desc: This gritty action thriller follows an ex-con tattoo artist as he fights to protect his estranged teenage daughter, who is being hunted by a Mexican drug cartel after getting mixed up in her boyfriend's criminal schemes(n)

programme.desc: An American nurse based in Tokyo finds work caring for an elderly psychotic woman at her home. programme.title: Nine Months
programme.desc: His wife Julianne Moore announces she's pregnant, but can Hugh Grant swap the Porsche for a pram? Family comedy with a good cameo from Robin Williams(n)

programme.title: In Her Shoes
programme.desc: Toni Collette and Cameron Diaz shine as a pair of mismatched sisters in this touching character study. Collette is the sensible, driven one, and Diaz is an irresponsible, self-centered party girl who may have stepped on her sibling's toes once too often. Shirley MacLaine is excellent as their grandmother, a Florida retiree whom the women thought was dead. Directed by Curtis Hanson. Mark Feuerstein, Ken Howard, Candice Azzara, Norman Lloyd, Francine Beers(n)

programme.title: The Lovely Bones
programme.desc: This heart-wrenching drama centers on young teenager Susie Salmon, who is murdered by her neighbor and watches over her grieving parents from a heaven of her own creation. Susie must come to terms with her own death, while sharing the pain her father and mother are working through(n)

Fact-based account of a group of gifted MIT scholars who develop a system for card-counting and use it to win big at Las Vegas casinos. Jim Sturgess, Kate Bosworth, Kevin Spacey. Directed by Robert Luketic(n)

programme.title: Tomorrowland
programme.desc: A teen finds a pin that sends her to a futuristic world, and goes on an trip through time and space to save the Earth(n)

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: Jon Voight stars as Paul Sarone, a slimy snake catcher in the Amazon on the trail of the biggest prize of all - a 40 foot long anaconda. The villainous Sarone will stop at nothing to catch his prey, even taking a documentary film crew hostage so he can use their boat. It's Saturday matinee 'horror' in the style of The Creature From The Black Lagoon - camp and implausibly cheesy, but great fun(n)

programme.title: The Great Raid
programme.desc: . In the waning days of World War II, General Douglas MacArthur chose to make good on a pledge that he made in 1942 -- that he would return to the Philippines after he and his troops were forced to retreat. However, MacArthur's determination was more than a matter of pride. Over 500 American soldiers were being held in Cabanatuan, a notoriously brutal prisoner of war camp in the Philippines operated by the Japanese army, and MacArthur wanted to see to it that they made it home(n)

programme.title: The Lovely Bones
programme.desc: This heart-wrenching drama centers on young teenager Susie Salmon, who is murdered by her neighbor and watches over her grieving parents from a heaven of her own creation. Susie must come to terms with her own death, while sharing the pain her father and mother are working through(n)

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: Thriller about an attorney whose affair with a glamorous career woman turns violent when he decides to return to his family. Michael Douglas and Glenn Close star(n)

programme.title: The People vs. Larry Flynt
programme.desc: Larry Flynt is a blue-collar pornographer from the backwoods of Kentucky committed to freedom of expression who builds his sex empire from scratch, managing go-go bars and strip clubs, before launching Hustler, the magazine that captured the hearts and groins of working-class America and scandalised the Establishment(n)

programme.title: Tristan & Isolde
programme.desc: Prosaic retelling of the legendary folktale about the star-crossed love affair of an English warrior and an Irish princess in war-torn medieval Britain(n)

programme.title: Brick
programme.desc: A student investigates a mysterious death in this noirish crime thriller(n)

programme.title: Risen
programme.desc: In this suspenseful biblical drama, Roman soldier Clavius and his partner Lucius are assigned to squelch an uprising in Jerusalem by locating the crucified body of Jesus Christ. But Clavius soon undergoes a crisis of faith when he witnesses miraculous events during their investigation(n)

programme.title: Rudderless
programme.desc: A father destroyed by the death of his son finds inspiration in the most unexpected of places in the feature directorial debut of veteran actor William H. Macy, who co-authored the screenplay with Casey Twenter and Jeff Robison. In the wake of his son's death, successful advertising executive Sam (Billy Crudup) moves aboard a docked sailboat, and drifts into an alcohol-induced haze. Something deep within Sam begins to stir however, when he discovers his late son's demo tapes, and decides to take a listen. Deeply moved by his son's artistry and determined not to let the boy's dreams die with him, Sam determines to learn each song note-for-note, and later summons the courage to perform one of them publicly. That performance, in turn, prompts aspiring musician Quentin (Anton Yelchin) to approach Sam, and together they form a band that transforms their lives in ways neither ever dreamt possible. Selena Gomez, Felicity Huffman, and Laurence Fishburne co-star(n)

programme.title: Imperium
programme.desc: An idealistic FBI agent goes deep undercover within a white-supremacy group in order to bring down the organisation from the inside(n)

programme.title: Wolf Totem
programme.desc: In this exciting adventure set in 1960s China, a student from Beijing is sent to teach a nomadic tribe in Mongolia. While there, he cares for and adopts a wolf cub, and their bond causes him to see the world in a new light(n)

programme.title: The Eagle Huntress
programme.desc: This inspiring documentary profiles a 13-year-old Mongolian girl who strives to become the first female in her culture to learn to hunt alongside a trained eagle. As she prepares for an annual eagle-hunting competition, she must also deal with the disapproval of several tribal elders(n)

programme.title: Risen
programme.desc: In this suspenseful biblical drama, Roman soldier Clavius and his partner Lucius are assigned to squelch an uprising in Jerusalem by locating the crucified body of Jesus Christ. But Clavius soon undergoes a crisis of faith when he witnesses miraculous events during their investigation(n)

programme.title: Smart People
programme.desc: For the first time since his wife's death, an arrogant English professor takes a shot at romance---with a former student. His protective 17-year-old daughter disapproves(n)

programme.title: Brick
programme.desc: A student investigates a mysterious death in this noirish crime thriller(n)

programme.title: Fathers and Daughters
programme.desc: A writer struggles to care for his daughter following a car accident that kills his wife. Years later, the daughter is a social worker whose long-standing intimacy issues are put to the test when she tries to connect with an abused child(n)

programme.title: Solitary Man
programme.desc: Ben Kalmen (Michael Douglas) had everything a man could possibly want -- a high-paying job, a beautiful wife, and a spacious Manhattan apartment. But now all of that is a distant memory -- he has heart problems, his marriage is over, and he's lost a fortune after being caught cutting corners in his East Coast car business. He's chosen his current girlfriend, Jordan, because her father can help him get a new auto dealership. But, when Ben takes Jordan's college-bound daughter on a tour of a prospective school, his steely new resolve is put to the ultimate test(n)

programme.title: Saint Laurent
programme.desc: The life of designer Yves Saint Laurent is depicted in this biopic(n)

programme.title: Equity
programme.desc: A senior investment banker tries to prove her worth to her firm by bringing in a tech company that's on the verge of going public. However, the IPO causes her to get tangled up in an investigation into securities fraud(n)

programme.title: Big Star: Nothing Can Hurt Me
programme.desc: A profile of the seminal power-pop band Big Star, who released three albums that influenced many groups in the decades after they came out to mostly indifferent sales(n)

programme.title: Future Weather
programme.desc: A 13-year-old environmentalist is abandoned by her unstable mother and finds herself reluctantly taken in by her acerbic grandmother, who's convinced that she knows what's best for the bright teenager(n)

programme.title: Jakob the Liar
programme.desc: Robin Williams stars as a resident of a Nazi-occupied Polish ghetto who tries to boost morale by relaying false radio broadcasts about Soviet advances against the Germans(n)

programme.title: No
programme.desc: In this engrossing political drama, a shrewd young ad executive is recruited for a campaign to vote Chilean president Augusto Pinochet out of office. But the real challenge is convincing the cynical Chileans that the election isn't a sham(n)

programme.title: Under the Same Moon
programme.desc: The debut feature from director Patricia Riggen, this drama centers on a young boy's journey across the U.S./Mexico border to be reunited with his mother. Adrian Alonso stars as Carlitos, a Mexican adolescent living with his grandmother while his mother works as a maid in the U.S., hoping someday to send for her child. But when the grandmother dies unexpectedly, Carlitos must sneak across the border and seek out his mother. Featuring a supporting performance by America Ferrera of ABC's Ugly Betty, Under the Same Moon premiered at the 2007 Sundance Film Festival, where it received a standing ovation(n)

programme.title: The Children of Huang Shi
programme.desc: A British journalist rescues a group of Chinese war orphans during the Japanese occupation of China in the 1930s. Jonathan Rhys Meyers and Radha Mitchell star in this poignant true story. Chow Yun-Fat, Michelle Yeoh, David Wenham. Directed by Roger Spottiswoode(n)

programme.title: Fight Club
programme.desc: Edward Norton stars as a disillusioned man whose life is completely changed when he meets Tyler Durden(n)

programme.title: W.
programme.desc: The story of George W. Bush traces the US President's rise to power from a privileged alcoholic to a born-again Christian whose belief in religious destiny helped move him to the top ranks of political power(n)

programme.title: The Sound and the Fury
programme.desc: James Franco directs this adaptation of William Faulkner's The Sound and the Fury, the writer's tale of the Compson family, a once wealthy Southern clan devolving into obscurity. Tim Blake Nelson portrays the patriarch, a boozy lawyer who oversees the lives of his children with cynical monologues delivered through an alcoholic haze. Quentin, the oldest child, goes to Harvard, but he's very close with Caddy, the only daughter in the family who has a child out of wedlock. Second son Jason attempts to rule the family with an iron fist, but he's full of resentment towards Caddy's bastard child. All of them attempt to care for the developmentally disabled Benjy (Franco). Franco employs a fractured approach to the narrative in an attempt to capture Faulkner's distinctive prose style. The Sound and the Fury screened at the 2014 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: The Diary of a Teenage Girl
programme.desc: In this adaptation of the acclaimed graphic novel, a precocious teenage girl living in 1970s San Francisco tries to understand the connection between sex and love after she seduces her bohemian mother's boyfriend(n)

programme.title: A Smile like Yours
programme.desc: A childless couple attempting to conceive discover that his sperm are lazy. Several trips to a fertility clinic prove fruitless. Also, the wife had surreptitiously quit taking the pill and provided her doctor with a sperm sample before the husband agreed to start trying to have a baby. The deception alienates the husband for a time. To compound things, a female architect has the hots for the husband and lures him out of town on business at exactly the wrong time(n)

programme.title: Dan in Real Life
programme.desc: A widower finds out the woman he fell in love with is his brother's girlfriend(n)

programme.title: Ever After
programme.desc: Andy Tennant's romantic comedy fantasy is set in 16th-century France, where, following the death of her father, Danielle De Barbarac is assigned kitchen duties in the castle by her stepmother Baroness Rodmilla de Ghent. A chance meeting with Prince Henry, heir apparent to the throne, leads to the potential for a romance that she fears could be ruined if he discovers a masquerade. A 'fairy-godmother' in the shape of Leonardo da Vinci eventually smoothes the path of true love but thanks to Barrymore, this is not another soft retelling of Cinderella but a punchy, energetic film with Barrymore in excellent form as the forthright Danielle(n)

programme.title: Underdog
programme.desc: Police pup Shoeshine is disgraced after a poor performance, but an accident sees him doused in superpowers and ready to save the day. Family action(n)

programme.title: Keeping Up with the Steins
programme.desc: A Hollywood agent plans an extravagant bar mitzvah in Dodger Stadium to top a celebration thrown by his bitter rival. Jeremy Piven ("Entourage") stars in this warm and funny family comedy. Jami Gertz, Daryl Hannah, Garry Marshall, Doris Roberts, Daryl Sabara. Directed by Scott Marshall(n)

programme.title: Dan in Real Life
programme.desc: A widower finds out the woman he fell in love with is his brother's girlfriend(n)

programme.title: Scoop
programme.desc: There's murder, magic, mystery and romance afoot as writer-director Woody Allen heads to London for this beguiling and riotous whodunit. Allen is a magician who's recruited by an American journalism student (Scarlett Johansson) to help solve a crime after a ghost (Ian McShane) tells her that a British aristocrat (Hugh Jackman), with whom she may be falling in love, might actually be a murderer known as "The Tarot Card Killer." Charles Dance, Romola Garai, Julian Glover, Sam Friend(n)

programme.title: There's Something About Mary
programme.desc: Slapstick comedy about a man so tormented by memories of a missed date with a beautiful girl that he hires a detective to trace her several years later. He is convinced that he missed out on his only chance for love, but when the detective locates her, he himself is smitten and soon proves to be a ruthless and unscrupulous rival in love(n)

programme.title: Father of Invention
programme.desc: In this poignant comedy, disgraced businessman Robert Axle works as a janitor after serving a prison sentence for gross negligence, and eventually he decides to rebuild his fortune by creating a new gadget(n)

programme.title: Roxanne
programme.desc: A small town firefighter with an abnormally long nose can't bring himself to act on his feelings for a beautiful astronomer, so woos her by proxy with the help of a hunky recruit. Romantic comedy(n)

programme.desc: A widower finds out the woman he fell in love with is his brother's girlfriend(n)

He is convinced that he missed out on his only chance for love, but when the detective locates her, he himself is smitten and soon proves to be a ruthless and unscrupulous rival in love(n)

programme.title: To Rome With Love
programme.desc: Locals and tourists in Rome find their lives intersecting. An architect tries to recapture his youth; an ordinary guy unexpectedly becomes famous; a couple is torn apart by new love interests; and an opera director urges a mortician to sing on stage(n)

programme.title: The People Under the Stairs
programme.desc: Spooky, disturbing and laced with a hefty dose of gallows humor, People Under the Stairs tells the story of a little boy who in desperation for cash (his impoverished mother is dying of cancer), robs a home. Unfortunately, he chooses the wrong house and ends up stuffed under a staircase with a group of other ill-fated children who barely survive the abuse and near starvation of their captivity. The couple who put them there are wealthy, but totally insane. When the newest child sees the way they abuse their adopted daughter, he decides to take action(n)

programme.title: Picture Perfect
programme.desc: This unconventional romantic comedy stars Jennifer Aniston as an aspiring ad exec. On a whim, she hires an acquaintance named Nick (Jay Mohr) to pose as her fiancé in an attempt to advance her career. Her plans go awry, however, when Nick falls for her and doesn't want to go through with a planned public "breakup." Kevin Bacon, Olympia Dukakis, Illeana Douglas, Kevin Dunn, Faith Prince, Ann Twomey(n)

programme.title: Novocaine
programme.desc: Steve Martin stars in this black comedy about a dentist with an uncomplicated existence, a thriving practice and a perfect fiancée. But his world is turned upside down when a waiflike drifter (Helena Bonham Carter) scams her way into his life(n)

programme.title: Step Brothers
programme.desc: Two spoilt middle-aged men who still live at home become stepbrothers when their parents marry. Forced to share a bedroom and look for jobs together, the pair eventually forge a friendship. But can the family's domestic situation ever be harmonious?(n)

programme.title: Uptown Girls
programme.desc: After losing her inheritance, a socialite works as a nanny to a precocious 8-year-old(n)

programme.title: Only the Lonely
programme.desc: A bittersweet tale of a single, 38-year-old Chicago cop who has lived with his mother all his life. When he falls in love with the shy daughter of a local mortician, he finds his resolve challenged by the guilt he feels at the prospect of leaving his strong-willed mother - guilt that she is only too happy to reinforce with her tart objections. Well-defined characterisations bring the working-class environment vividly to life(n)

programme.desc: Two spoilt middle-aged men who still live at home become stepbrothers when their parents marry. Forced to share a bedroom and look for jobs together, the pair eventually forge a friendship. But can the family's domestic situation ever be harmonious?(n)

programme.desc: A widowed Englishman and a Danish hairdresser who's been left by her husband forge a fragile romance during a trip to Italy to see their son and daughter get married(n)

programme.desc: Nick and Shawn are the two most popular guys in high school. Eyebrows are raised when they decide to ditch football camp for cheerleader camp - for the girls and for the glory! (2009)(n)

programme.title: Get a Job
programme.desc: Will (Miles Teller) and Jillian (Anna Kendrick) are a young couple who recently graduated from college and are trying to hack it in the real world. Dylan Kidd directed this comedy about millennial malaise, with Bryan Cranston, Alison Brie, and Christopher Mintz-Plasse co-starring(n)

programme.desc: Two spoilt middle-aged men who still live at home become stepbrothers when their parents marry. Forced to share a bedroom and look for jobs together, the pair eventually forge a friendship. But can the family's domestic situation ever be harmonious?(n)

programme.title: The Family Stone
programme.desc: The Stones, a New England family, have their annual holiday gathering. The eldest son brings his girlfriend home to meet his parents, brothers and sisters. programme.desc: An interracial couple moves into their California dream home, only to find themselves the target of their volatile next-door neighbour -- a racist LAPD officer --(n)

programme.desc: A London cocaine dealer wants to retire with his millions and his health intact, but mob boss Price has other ideas, dragging him into a set-up involving a missing junkie, a million stolen E's and an East European hitman(n)

programme.desc: Jasper Redd performs a rhythmic comedy routine at the Folly Theater in Kansas City(n)

programme.title: The Scout
programme.desc: Comic tale of a baseball scout who discovers a pitcher with a 100-mile-per-hour fast ball. Look for cameos from Bob Costas, George Steinbrenner, Tony Bennett, Steve Garvey, Tim McCarver, Bret Saberhagen, Keith Hernandez, Roy Firestone, and Ozzie Smith(n)

programme.title: Transporter 2
programme.desc: In this high-octane sequel packed with exciting car chases and martial-arts battles, an ex-Special Forces operative (Jason Statham) is working as a chauffeur for a wealthy family and springs into action when his employers' young son is kidnapped. Alessandro Gassman, Amber Valletta, Kate Nauta, Matthew Modine. Directed by Louis Leterrier(n)

programme.title: Hard Luck
programme.desc: An infamous ex-con on the road to redemption finds his quest unexpectedly complicated by the police, the mafia, and two of the nation's most vicious serial killers in a high octane crime thriller starring and directed by Mario Van Peebles and featuring Wesley Snipes and Cybill Shepherd(n)

programme.title: American Gods
programme.desc: A Prayer for Mad Sweeney. After an over-too-quickly reunion with Shadow, Laura joins an unlikely travel companion on the road back to life and back to Shadow. Mad Sweeney's long, often tragic past is explored(n)

programme.title: Hart's War
programme.desc: World War II drama in which a former law student - now a lieutenant in the army - is forced to defend himself and two black officers after a murder occurs in the POW camp they have been sent to. Meanwhile, a wily colonel plans to use the distraction of the investigation to plot a daring escape(n)

programme.title: Miracles From Heaven
programme.desc: In this religious drama based on a true story, a 10-year-old girl is inexplicably cured of a chronic digestive disorder following a serious accident in which she falls three stories. Soon, her mother believes that her recovery is a miracle(n)

programme.title: Bowfinger
programme.desc: Written by and starring Steve Martin as down-on-his-luck movie producer and director Bobby Bowfinger who finds his dream script and is desperate to get it made into a film. With backing from a famous producer (Rober Downey Jnr), a cast comprising of an aspiring actress (Heather Graham) who will do anything to be in the movies and a slightly over the hill diva, there is only one hitch; everyone is convinced that he has landed A-list star Kit Ramsey (Eddie Murphy). But there is a way to get him in the picture(n)

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A social worker who finds missing children is tasked with tracking down a kidnapped magical Buddhist child and rescuing him from an evil sorcerer(n)

programme.title: Lakeview Terrace
programme.desc: An interracial couple moves into their California dream home, only to find themselves the target of their volatile next-door neighbour -- a racist LAPD officer --(n)

programme.desc: At his new high school, a rebellious teen is lured into an underground fight club, where he finds a mentor in a mixed martial arts veteran(n)

programme.title: The Constant Gardener
programme.desc: Quiet diplomat Justin searches for answers when his activist wife is murdered in Kenya(n)

programme.title: The Scout
programme.desc: Comic tale of a baseball scout who discovers a pitcher with a 100-mile-per-hour fast ball. Look for cameos from Bob Costas, George Steinbrenner, Tony Bennett, Steve Garvey, Tim McCarver, Bret Saberhagen, Keith Hernandez, Roy Firestone, and Ozzie Smith(n)

programme.title: Daylight's End
programme.desc: A rogue warrior wanders the globe after a plague turns most of humanity into bloodthirsty creatures. He comes across a few survivors trapped in a police station, and decides to help fight for their safety(n)

programme.title: Kinky Boots
programme.desc: A failing shoe factory that's struggling to maintain its footing following the death of its founder finds the inspiration needed to stay in business from the most unlikely of sources in veteran British director Julian Jarrold's warmhearted tale of fancy footwear and changing times. Charlie Price (Joel Edgerton) just can't seem to keep the factory afloat on his own, and with the livelihood of his entire small town hanging in the balance, he needs to come up with something truly groundbreaking. Lola (Chiwetel Ejiofor) is a sassy female impersonator with a flair for style and a great mind for design. Though on paper their inventive scheme to save the factory may sound too outrageous to be true, stranger things have happened in the world of business, and if it doesn't break them, it may just transform them into the richest footwear manufacturers in all of England(n)

programme.title: Running Scared
programme.desc: Distinguished by a sharp, witty dialogue between its two cop protagonists, Ray and Danny (Gregory Hines and Billy Crystal), this entertaining crime drama is well worth a visit. Ray and Danny are nearly blown away by super bad guy Julio (Jimmy Smits), and their boss is peeved at them as usual. So the two are given a holiday from their beat in Chicago and travel to the sunny shores of Key West. They like it enough to retire from police work and open a business there. But when the duo returns to the Windy City, Julio is about to pull off a big drug deal and retirement may not be such a good idea(n)

programme.title: Tales From the Hood
programme.desc: In this chilling anthology of inner-city horror stories, a mortician shares grisly tales about his "patrons" when a group of crooks show up at his funeral home looking for a stash of drugs(n)

programme.title: The Detonator
programme.desc: Sonni Griffith is en route to Poland to expose a notorious arms dealer when the dealer is tipped off to the agent's identity and Griffith subsequently ends up in a prison cell. Soon released by the CIA with a mission to escort beautiful Russian Nadia back to the United States, Griffith quickly learns that the very same arms dealer he sought to wipe out is willing to kill for a valuable secret known only to his strong-willed charge(n)

programme.title: Sprung
programme.desc: Love turns into a battle of the sexes in this comedy starring Tisha Campbell and Paula Jai Parker. Best friends Adina (Parker) and Brandy (Campbell) start to grow apart when Brandy falls in love. So Adina devises a scheme to break up the two lovebirds. Rusty Cundieff, Joe Torry, Clarence Williams III(n)

programme.desc: Quiet diplomat Justin searches for answers when his activist wife is murdered in Kenya(n)

programme.desc: Newly fired sports agent Jerry Maguire carves out his own career, signing a star pro-football player and falling for new employee Dorothy Boyd. Comedy drama(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Call Me James. Season 3 begins with Ghost out of the drug game, and Angela having to decide between love and honor. Also, Tasha is reeling from Shawn's death, and Tommy feels compelled to make some adventurous moves(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: It's Never Over. Ghost deals with loose ends before tangling with some new nightlife competition; Tommy confronts Tasha, who must learn to coexist with Angela. Later, Tommy finds an advisor in a former lover(n)

programme.title: Madeline Sing Along: Madeline and Her Friends
programme.desc: The French schoolgirl from the beloved children's stories sings songs with her pals(n)

programme.title: Baby Boom
programme.desc: A supercharged business executive finds her life changing dramatically when she inherits a year-old baby from a cousin. Too busy at work to raise a child, she is traumatised by nappies, baby food and an increasingly distant husband. Eventually forced to resign, she takes off to a country farmhouse, where she discovers her real feelings. An amiable comedy which fires a well-aimed broadside at the 80s yuppie lifestyle(n)

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: It's Christmas Eve, and on this night psychologist Marcia Fieldstone has asked her radio talk show audience what they are wishing and dreaming for during this season of hope. A little boy hears her in Seattle and reaches for the phone. He's got a Christmas wish, he tells her, a really big one, except it's not for him. It's for his dad. Jonah wishes his father, Sam could find a new wife because Dad has been so sad and lonely since Mom died a year-and-a-half ago(n)

programme.title: Cheaper by the Dozen 2
programme.desc: In this hilarious sequel, the Bakers bring their 12 children together for a summer vacation that turns into a comical competition with Tom's longtime rival(n)

programme.title: Ice Age: The Meltdown
programme.desc: Diego, Manny and Sid return in this sequel to the hit Ice Age. This time around the Ice Age is over and is starting to melt, which will destroy their valley. So they must unite and warn everyone about the situation(n)

programme.title: Jingle All the Way
programme.desc: Harassed businessman Howard tells his little boy he'll buy him a Turboman for Christmas, only to find that every store has sold out. Racing round the shops in search of the last toy, he realises that postman Myron is doing exactly the same thing(n)

programme.title: The Black Stallion
programme.desc: Featuring extraordinary cinematography that imbues the classic Walter Farely horse story with the hues and feeling of a great painting and telling the touching (without undue sentiment) yet truly exciting tale of a boy and his horse, The Black Stallion is truly a classic family film. The story begins on a storm-tossed sea in a large steamer heading west from the Middle East. Among the passengers are young Alec and his jovial father. Also aboard is a dangerously wild, but glorious black stallion. Alec is fascinated by the almost outworldly creature and gingerly slips him some sugar cubes. That night a terrible storm overtakes the ship and it sinks, killing everyone aboard but Alec and the horse, whom he manages to free before the ship goes down. Caught up in the horse's lead rope and floundering in the rough seas, Alec nearly drowns. But with Alec towed along behind the strongly swimming horse, the two make it to the safety of a tiny desert island. It is here, as boy and horse struggle to survive, that a great bond is formed. Initially theirs is a relationship formed out of necessity, but eventually the two become the best of friends so that when a rescue ship finally comes, Alec refuses to leave without the horse. Once back in his urban American home, Alec must face new challenges and figure out what to do with his still half-wild friend. Once again it is "the Black" who provides the solution when he escapes and ends up at the barn of a former jockey who sees in the steed great potential on the track. With his help, Alec and "the Black" enter an important horse race and this leads to the story's exciting and suspenseful conclusion(n)

programme.title: Cheaper by the Dozen 2
programme.desc: In this hilarious sequel, the Bakers bring their 12 children together for a summer vacation that turns into a comical competition with Tom's longtime rival(n)

programme.desc: Mapperson's Daughter; Big Ho Down. The new face on Mapperson's delivery truck is chosen; Angela and her dad compete in a hoedown contest against Nanette and her father(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington Bear
programme.sub-title: Paddington Steps Out; Paddington Prepares; Paddington Recommended
programme.desc: Paddington Steps Out; Paddington Prepares; Paddington Recommended. Paddington and the Browns attend the ballet; Mr. Gruber needs an assistant to help with his first book; and while being fitted for a tuxedo, Paddington wanders into a neighboring restaurant and is mistaken for the famed gourmet Duncan Hyde(n)

programme.title: Connie the Cow
programme.sub-title: Where Does It Belong; Looking for Grandma; Connie and the Apple Tree
programme.desc: Where Does It Belong; Looking for Grandma; Connie and the Apple Tree. Belinda teaches Connie and Patch a new game; Connie has an idea that could keep apples from spoiling(n)

programme.title: Thomas Edison's Secret Lab
programme.desc: Awesomoblie Deluxe; Follow Your Nose. Kent loses the kids' new self-driving car; and J.D. and Kent lose their noses(n)

programme.title: Liberty's Kids
programme.desc: The Boston Tea Party. The kids stumble upon the Boston Tea Party, which takes place on the very ship in which Sarah has just crossed the Atlantic. Sarah, whose mother is an English friend of Ben Franklin's, is on her way to an apprenticeship in Franklin's Philadelphia print shop. Waiting to meet her: apprentice James Hiller, who's a budding newshound; and freed slave Moses, who now works for Franklin (voice of Walter Cronkite). Other voices include Reo Jones (Sarah), Chris Lundquist (James), Kathleen Barr (Henri) and D. Kevin Williams (Moses)(n)

programme.title: Bling
programme.desc: A theme-park worker teams up with his robots to get a ring for his childhood crush(n)

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: A team of intrepid adventurers travels through the outer reaches of the galaxy, each week finding excitement and adventure on Galaxy Quest! Or at least that's the way it was in the mid-1970s, when brave if reckless Captain Peter Quincy Taggart, lovely Lieutenant Tawny Madison, and inscrutable alien Dr. Lazarus were the leaders of an interstellar law enforcement team on the TV series of that name. Twenty years later, the show is still in reruns, and Jason Nesmith (Tim Allen), Gwen DeMarco (Sigourney Weaver), and Alexander Dane (Alan Rickman) prop up their sagging careers by making appearances at sci-fi conventions, where they grudgingly shake hands and give autographs for the show's socially inept following. However, it turns out that nerdy sci-fi fans aren't the only ones watching: somewhere in another solar system, a group of alien rebels living under a regime of violence and repression have picked up broadcasts of Galaxy Quest, and they aren't aware that it's fiction. They travel to Earth and encounter the Galaxy Quest cast, who figure that they're just another bunch of guys who like to dress funny. However, they soon realize that they're being hired not for another autograph-signing session but for a real-life outer space rescue mission. Galaxy Quest was directed by Dean Parisot, who had a background in TV directing before his theatrical debut with the dark comedy Home Fries(n)

Chip Rockefella, a casino owner dreams of a relationship with Wilma himself so he lures the quartet off to Rock Vegas where he can put his plans into action(n)

programme.title: Blood Drive
programme.desc: The F-cking Cop. In the dystopian future of 1999, Arthur Bailey is the last good cop among a horde of corrupt officials, living in desolate downtown Los Angeles. He's about to get caught up in a race where the cars run on human blood and the last participant to arrive at each checkpoint has their head explode in the premiere of this series(n)

programme.title: We Are Still Here
programme.desc: A grieving couple who recently lost their son move to a New England town, where they are soon haunted by vengeful spirits looking for a sacrifice(n)

programme.title: Identity theft: learn about it and how to get LifeLock protection
programme.desc: Are you at risk for identity theft? Get the facts from experts, and hear stories from victims. Discover how LifeLock can help protect you – with proprietary technology, and U.S.-based agents who help set things right if your identity is ever stolen(n)

programme.title: Paid Programming
programme.desc: Paid Programming(n)

programme.title: Accidents Caught on Camera with HD Mirror Cam!
programme.desc: See crazy accidents caught on camera with the HD Mirror Cam - the most important tool you'll ever own for your car! HD Mirror Cam turns any rearview mirror into a dash cam, and captures it all so if anything ever happens you always have the proof!(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: The Odyssey of Flight 33. Thrown off course by a freak tailwind, a passenger jet finds itself flying over a prehistoric landscape, festooned with dinosaurs. Deducing that they've somehow passed through a time warp, the crew of Flight 33, headed by Captain Farver (John Anderson), desperately seek out a way of returning to their own time. Managing to retrieve the tailwind, the crew succeeds in its goal -- almost. Written by Rod Serling, with technical advice from his novelist brother Robert J. Serling (then an aviation writer for American Airlines), this Twilight Zone episode is highlighted by some disturbingly convincing "monster" animation, courtesy of film producer Jack H. Harris (of Dinosaurus! fame) and the special-effects wizards at Project Unlimited. "The Odyssey of Flight 33" first aired February 24, 1961(n)

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: In a world where technology exists to enter the human mind through dream invasion, a highly skilled thief is given a final chance at redemption which involves executing his toughest job to date: Inception(n)

programme.title: Lake Placid: The Final Chapter
programme.desc: A new sheriff has a big problem on her hands when a poacher unleashes the wrath of giant crocodiles in the fourth installment of the campy horror movie franchise(n)

programme.title: Piranha
programme.desc: Haute Tension and Hills Have Eyes director Alexandre Aja pays homage to the films that made him fall in love with the horror genre by helming this comedic remake of director Joe Dante's 1978 Jaws parody. Lake Victoria may look peaceful, but beneath the placid waters of this painterly lake lurks a deadly menace. A powerful underwater tremor has released scores of man-eating prehistoric fish into the waters, and now it's up to a group of unlikely heroes to band together and defeat the razor-toothed predators. With time running out and the aquatic carnivores taking over, one brave heroine (Elisabeth Shue) will risk everything to save the lake and prevent her family from becoming fish food. Richard Dreyfuss, Ving Rhames, Jerry O'Connell, and Adam Scott star in the Dimension Films production(n)

programme.title: The Scorpion King
programme.desc: In a time before the pyramids, an evil king threatens to take over the world, so the leaders of the remaining tribes under threat call upon a desert warrior to help them defeat the wicked one and his brutal hordes. As the warrior battles against the evil around him, he is preparing for a final showdown that will decide if it is to be his destiny to become the great Scorpion King(n)

programme.title: G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra
programme.desc: Stephen Sommers' Hasbro-produced action-adventure, starring Channing Tatum, Sienna Miller and Christopher Eccleston. When a devastatingly powerful new weapons system, designed by James McCullen, is attacked in transit by the evil Baroness, it's clear that something bad is afoot. Thankfully, the finest of America's finest, the GI Joes, are on hand to repulse the attempted theft. But it's not long before the shadowy terrorist organisation Cobra mounts another, more successful, raid and hightails it with the missiles. Luckily, one of the Joes, Duke recognises the Baroness, giving the goodies the lead they need to track down the baddies before too much damage can be done - though not before many explosions, a double-crossing and a major Parisian landmark is wiped off the face of the Earth..(n)

programme.title: G.I. Joe: Retaliation
programme.desc: The G.I. Joes are hunted by the U.S. government after the president is replaced with an impostor who plans to use a new superweapon to achieve global domination(n)

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: A slave has an affair with his master's daughter as Mount Vesuvius prepares to erupt in A.D. 79(n)

programme.title: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home
programme.desc: Science fiction adventure in which Captain Kirk and the crew of the Enterprise must travel back in time to the 1980s to save a pair of whales(n)

programme.title: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
programme.desc: In the final big-screen outing for most of the original crew, Kirk's arch-enemies, the Klingons, sue for peace and the Enterprise is dispatched to escort the Klingon party to the negotiations. When the Klingon ship is attacked, apparently by the Enterprise, Kirk and McCoy are blamed for the assassination of the Klingon leader(n)

programme.title: Dark Matter
programme.desc: Welcome to the Revolution. After receiving a distress call from a former associate, the crew of the Raza find themselves in the middle of a colony's fight for independence(n)

programme.title: Star Trek Generations
programme.desc: David Carson's film, the seventh in the Star Trek feature film series, opens with Captain James T Kirk leading a rescue mission to save refugees on a planet threatened by a mysterious energy ribbon. But in the process Kirk is lost, presumed dead(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: First Contact
programme.desc: Sci-fi drama in which the Federation fleet must travel back in time to confront the Borg, a deadly group of cybernetically-enhanced aliens. The Borg plan to prevent the first contact between humans and alien beings in order to stop the Earth from advancing and to colonise the planet themselves. Picard and his crew must foil the Borg plot and ensure that the epoch-making contact actually takes place(n)

programme.title: Children of the Corn
programme.desc: Donald P Borchers' remake of the supernatural horror, based on a short story by Stephen King, and starring David Anders, Kandyse McClure and Daniel Newman. Back in 1963 a dreadful drought hit Nebraska, and it had a devastating effect on one small, isolated town. Out in the parched fields, one of the community's children had a fire-and-brimstone dream in which it was revealed by an entity called He Who Walks Behind the Rows that the blight was due to the erroneous ways of the adults. The solution was simple: everyone over the age of 18 must die; and so the children slaughtered the town's adult population. From that point on, everyone would be ritually sacrificed upon reaching their 19th birthday to appease He Who Walks... Now, 12 years on, Burton and VIcky Stanton have the misfortune of stumbling upon the ill-fated outpost. Will they make it out alive - or are they destined to come to the same gory end as the others?(n)

programme.title: Odd Thomas
programme.desc: In this creepy and exhilarating thriller, a cook at a greasy spoon has the ability to see the dead, which leads him to discover that supernatural forces are planning something wicked for his hometown. With the help of his girlfriend and the sheriff, he tries to defeat the evil spirits(n)

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: A slave has an affair with his master's daughter as Mount Vesuvius prepares to erupt in A.D. 79(n)

programme.title: G.I. Joe: Retaliation
programme.desc: The G.I. Joes are hunted by the U.S. government after the president is replaced with an impostor who plans to use a new superweapon to achieve global domination(n)

programme.title: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Johnny Blaze is a talented motorcyclist that takes the hard decision to sell his soul to the devil in order to save his father life, affected by a terminal cancer. Even though he fulfilled his part of the deal, his father dies and he is forced to leave his hometown, his friends and his love. Ears later, he becomes a world-renowned acrobat and in one of his shows he meets again Roxanne, his old girlfriend. But Mephistopheles intrudes once again in their lives with a dangerous mission in mind: to fight against his tough and rude son, that wants to install hell on earth and make everybody¿s life miserable. Nevertheless, this is the only chance that Johnny has to recover the control of his destiny(n)

programme.title: Troy
programme.desc: A tale of romance, betrayal and power set in 1193 BC, Troy. The love-struck Prince of Troy has fallen for the Queen of Sparta, angering the king, whose brother uses this love triangle against him in an effort to gain more power(n)

programme.title: The Librarian: Return to King Solomon's Mines
programme.desc: Brainy adventurer Flynn Carsen joins forces with a spunky archaeologist for a sweeping, globe-trotting quest to uncover the ancient treasures of the fabled mines of King Solomon. Along the way, Carsen unearths deep secrets about his family(n)

programme.title: The Librarian: Curse Of The Judas Chalice
programme.desc: Bookish brainiac Flynn Carsen teams up with a New Orleans jazz singer to rescue a kidnapped scientist and protect a sacred chalice, thereby foiling a plot that would give new life to a notorious vampire(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: You Can't Miss. Bud appears on a dating-game show called "You Can't Miss"---but the show's never had a Bundy as a contestant. Candy: Chantal Dubay. Adam: Bill Maher. Henry: Brian Leckner. Eugene: Nat Winston. Rodrigo: Ron Evans(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The One with Rachel's Date. Rachel's date with Joey's soap-opera costar has Ross up in arms about her going out with his unborn baby onboard. Meanwhile, a case of mistaken identity gives Chandler the chance to ruin a clueless colleague; and Monica and Phoebe have to let the same guy down after he fails as both a cook and a beau(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The One with the Stain. Phoebe tries to help Eric get over Ursula, but the sisters' similarities prove a bit too distracting---and disturbing. Also, Ross has his eye on an ailing neighbour's apartment for Rachel; and Monica fears that her new maid may be cleaning her out of clothes(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The One with the Stripper. Rachel tells her short-tempered father that she is pregnant with Ross' baby. Monica arranges to have a 'stripper' perform at Chandler's belated bachelor party(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The One with Monica's Boots. Phoebe uses Ross's son to score tickets to a Sting concert after learning that Ben attends school with the pop star's little boy; Monica hides the truth about her pricey new leather boots from a clueless Chandler; Rachel helps Joey's sister break unexpected news to her brother(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Joey Dates Rachel
programme.desc: The One Where Joey Dates Rachel. To prepare Joey for his big date the following night, Rachel eagerly agrees to go out with him for a rare night on the town, but when each is pleasantly surprised with their newfound compatibility, they begin to regard each other in a way that no one could have predicted. Meanwhile, Chandler sets a new record on Monica's new Ms Pac-Man machine, but his three-letter ID might prove too offensive when Ben visits. And Ross is finally allowed to teach an honours class but its location on the far side of town means that he must break the land speed record to get there on time(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Chandler Takes a Bath
programme.desc: The One Where Chandler Takes a Bath. Ross and Rachel are at odds over knowing their baby's sex---and their own odd choices in names for the kid; Monica inducts Chandler into the world of bathroom relaxation; and Phoebe confronts Joey about his feelings for the wrong friend(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Secret Closet
programme.desc: The One with the Secret Closet. Monica's mysterious locked closet has a too-curious Chandler all keyed up; Joey finds a way for Ross to spend more time with Rachel, which also gets him out of living with a woman he secretly loves; Phoebe learns the truth about Monica's sexy massage mannerisms(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Joey Tells Rachel
programme.desc: The One Where Joey Tells Rachel. A jealous Ross coerces Joey into telling Rachel about his feelings; Phoebe introduces Monica to the soul mate she didn't get to marry, much to Chandler's chagrin(n)

programme.title: Family Guy

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Fore, Father. When Lois (voice of Alex Borstein) announces that it's time for "spring cleaning," Peter (voice of Seth MacFarlane) is anxious to get out of it. He ends up taking Chris (voice of Seth Green) on a fishing trip with his neighbors, Joe (voice of Patrick Warburton) and Cleveland (voice of Mike Henry) and their children. Cleveland is also eager to get away as his wife is having a visit from her "Aunt Flo." "Loretta likes to personify her menses in humorous ways," he needlessly explains. On the disastrous trip ("All we caught was a tire, a boot, a tin can, and this book of clichés"), Joe criticizes Peter's parenting skills, and says he's turning Chris into a slacker. Peter responds by getting Chris a job shagging golf balls at a driving range. But Peter is soon distracted from his own son by Cleveland, Jr. (Henry), who can drive a ball 300 yards. Cleveland warns him that the boy has a short attention span, but Peter is determined to turn the boy into a pro, and enters him into the golf club's "Man-Boy Golf Tournament," all the while ignoring his own son. Meanwhile, Stewie (MacFarlane) destroys Brian's (MacFarlane) library. Revenge is served cold when Stewie returns from getting his first vaccination, and Brian soon has him convinced that he's been injected with some kind of mind control serum. This episode features the voice talents of Gary Cole and Nicole Sullivan. The cold opening, a cruel parody of Little House on the Prairie, was edited from FOX's original airing of the episode, but was restored in repeats(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: The Courtship of Stewie's Father. Stewie has been taking out his aggressions on Lois, and she decides that the reason is because he isn't close enough to his father, so she orders them to bond. They finally succeed at Disney World(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Mother Tucker. Peter's mom announces that she is getting a divorce(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter's Two Dads. Peter stops drinking (but starts smoking crack) after accidentally killing his father while drinking heavily at Meg's birthday party. But is the dead man really his father? No, his mother confesses, he isn't. So Peter heads to Ireland to find his real dad. Meanwhile, Stewie develops masochistic tendencies(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: The Former Life of Brian. Brian looks up an old girlfriend and discovers that he's the father of a misbehaving13-year-old son, who soon moves in with the Griffins. Chace Crawford has a voice cameo as the ne'er-do-well boyfriend of a young widow Brian is trying to pick up(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Quagmire's Dad. Quagmire can accept his dad's lifestyle choices, but not when they involve Brian(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Brian's a Bad Father. Brian's overlooked teenage son Dylan, now a TV star, shows up in town, so his father, rather than step up and try to be a good dad instead tries to cadge a job on the series' writing staff(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Papa Has a Rollin' Son. For Father's Day, the guys locate Joe's estranged dad, but when Joe tells them the man can't deal with people who have disabilities, Peter pretends to be Joe(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Scammed Yankees. With Lois and her mom relaxing at a spa, Peter entertains his father-in-law at home, where the two guys get taken in an email scam. So off they go to Africa to get back their dough. Meanwhile, Brian takes an interest in Meg's friend, Patty(n)

programme.desc: Go for the Old. When Al's mistaken for being 65, he gets revenge by playing in the senior athletic games. Ira: E.D. Miller. Official: Kevin Brief. Al: Ed O'Neill. Peggy: Katey Sagal. Bud: David Faustino. Kelly: Christina Applegate(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: Unalful Entry. A burglar sues after Al decks him(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: The Movie Show. Kelly breaks a date to join her parents at the movies, where she finds her date with another woman(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: 'Til Death Do Us Part. Peg (Katey Sagal) tells Marcy (Amanda Bearse) in STRICTEST CONFIDENCE that Al (Ed O'Neill) isn't so hot in bed. Evidently misconstruing the concept of STRICTEST CONFIDENCE, Marcy proceeds to relay this news to everyone in the neighborhood and the outlying suburbs. Embarrassed, Al vows to get back into tip-top shape for his next boudoir appointment. This episode affords the viewer the first horrifying glimpse of the Bundy basement--not to mention some really "bad hair."(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: 'Tis Time to Smell the Roses. Al's early retirement ends when Peg spends their windfall. Charlene Tilton has a cameo. Blaub: Susan Peretz. Manager: Peter Jason. Al: Ed O'Neill. Peg: Katey Sagal. Bud: David Faustino(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: The Old Insurance Dodge. When his dilapidated Dodge is stolen, Al (Ed O'Neill) eagerly awaits an insurance settlement--which, thanks to the machinations of neighbor Jefferson (Ted McGinley), promises to be a lot more than he deserves. In the meantime, Al accepts a number of high-end "loaners", including a brand-new Lincoln Town Car. Elsewhere, Kelly (Christina Applegate). blithely misunderstands what "50 K" means in her search for suitable transportation. If you like "fat jokes" about female celebrities, you've come to the right place(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: Wedding Repercussions. In this sequel to the earlier episode The Wedding Show, the Bundys' cousin Jimmy (a young Abraham Benrubi) finds out that someone else slept with his wife Janie on their wedding day. In desperation, Jimmy appeals to Bud (David Faustino) to help him find the guilty party--little suspecting that Bud himself is the very guy he seeks. This episode offers yet another variation on the Bundy Family Credo: "Lie, Sell Shoes, and Lie"(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: The Proposition. A millionaire offers Peggy a fortune for a night with Al(n)

programme.sub-title: The One with the Tea Leaves
programme.desc: The One with the Tea Leaves. A faulty tea-leaf reading leads Phoebe into a fling with a freak; Rachel tries to smooth things out with a jilted Joey by asking him for advice on an odd---and untrue---situation at work; Ross gets caught in a tight spot while trying to retrieve a shirt from his ex-girlfriend(n)

programme.title: Friends

Meanwhile, Ross and Chandler help Joey prep for an audition to host the world's worst game show. Katherine: Adria Tennor. Ray: Jonathan Nichols. Joey: Matt LeBlanc(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Cooking Class

When Monica's cooking at the restaurant is harshly criticised in a newspaper, she goes to a criticism class taught by the reviewer, hoping to convince him to reconsider his opinion. Meanwhile, Rachel gets upset when a cute salesgirl flirts with Ross while he and Rachel are shopping for baby supplies. And, nervous about a major job interview, Chandler receives some questionable coaching from Phoebe(n)

programme.sub-title: The One Where Rachel Is Late
programme.desc: The One Where Rachel Is Late. A week past her due date, a grumpy Rachel's only hopes for inducing labour include spicy foods and something even spicier with Ross. Meanwhile, Monica and Phoebe try to make the baby wait interesting---and profitable; and Chandler catches heat for catching some sleep during Joey's big-screen debut(n)

programme.sub-title: The One Where Rachel Has a Baby

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Rachel Has a Baby
programme.desc: The One Where Rachel Has a Baby. After 47 hours of labor, Rachel has her baby(n)

programme.desc: Flush of Genius. Cleveland suffers a concussion after falling off a toilet, losing not only his dignity but Cleveland Jr's admiration as well. Meanwhile, an excited Rallo realises that he's tall enough to ride on his favourite roller coaster(n)

programme.title: The Cleveland Show
programme.desc: Mama Drama. A sad Mother's Day looms for Donna because she's estranged from her own mum, whom she hasn't seen in years, so Cleveland hires an actress to play her. But then he runs into Donna's real mother and makes one last effort to reunite them(n)

programme.title: American Dad!
programme.desc: Jenny Fromdabloc. After Snot professes his love for Hayley and gets shot down, Steve and Roger devise a plan to cheer him up. Roger dresses up as Steve's cousin from New Jersey, Jenny Fromdabloc, and Snot falls hard for her. Meanwhile, Stan wants to live like a gentleman of the 1960s, complete with dark suits and dry martinis(n)

programme.title: American Dad!
programme.desc: Home Wrecker. Stan and Francine fight over how to redecorate the house, and they come up with a Solomonic resolution(n)

programme.title: American Dad!
